resources.string: Jobs for Youth is a year-round program designed to help young people who live in San Mateo County develop their job search skills. The program provides employment services to all youth between the ages of 14-21 years old at no cost to them or to employers. There are no eligibility requirements to join this program. Services are available to all youth regardless of socio-economic or risk level.

Job placement assistance (job referrals)

 One-on-one job counseling 

 Job preparation workshops that cover: 1.) mastering job application forms; 2.) interviewing skills; 3.) resume writing assistance; and 4.) job search websites for teens 

 All interested youth must contact their nearest Jobs for Youth office to sign up and attend a job preparation workshop. Jobs for Youth staff can also provide presentations/job preparation workshops at the local high schools. If interested, please contact your nearest location and speak to a Jobs for Youth Specialist.

string-array.name: duties
string-array.item: Fill all requests for groceries, sort and store donated food items, maintenance of food items.
Greet and assist customers, restock, clean and maintain store.
Receptionist work, comput work ,greeting people, answering phones.
Customer service, food preparation, cashier, cleaning, restocking, dish-washing, shop.
